name: Hexa Merge: Block Puzzle Game
description:
Enjoy best puzzle game for FREE!
“Hexa Merge” is a tetris style exciting block puzzle game.
Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages.
Move blocks to fill up the squares and collect block pieces to level up!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the frame
• Blocks can't be rotated.

FEATURES
• BLOCK PUZZLE
- Smoth effect for block puzzle game!
- Play easily and quickly.
- You can play offline in anytime.
- Gorgeous Visual & Sound effects
- Over 300+ unique puzzles

NOTES
• "Hexa Merge" is free, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Hints.
